Text: A few days later...
I...did it! I have made a prototype...Energy Drink!
I must hurry...and get data.
And my subject will be...
Gamma...she never tires...and is always energetic.

And Delta...is always energetic...so I don't know if
it'll work on her...

As I figured...Beta is perfect... But she has already
said no...so I should let it go...

I've got no other options left... I shall test with
another specimen...
It's so bright...outside...

Once I get my data, I shall immediately return...
Come on, boar.
Grrr...

This is the type we catch to eat... It seems
lazy from being in the sun...perfect.

It has shackles on...so whatever happens, it'll be
all right...
Here, drink this... This'll make you feel better.
Groar... *squeal*?!
Oh...is it working...?
*squeal*!!!

Ohhh...it's squealing rather loudly. Did it work
for exhaustion recovery...?
Groarrr!!!

It broke its shackles! Is it bringing out...its
hidden potential?
Grrroarrr!!!

Oh, it must have tremendous power...for it to easily
break down the barriers...

How splendid...! Its effects have exceeded my
expectations.
Grrroarrr...
The boar...is now gone.

As it pertains to humans and elves, there is still
room for improvement...

And so, the legendary hero in black saves the cute
silver-haired elf from the demon clan andâ€”
Wh-What was that sound?!
What in the heck happened?!
I tried to supress its excitement...and...*mumbles*...
Eta...? I have a bad feeling...
Oh? Did the boar come back as Beta...?

Who're you calling a boar?! I came to check on
you 'cause I heard a crazy sound! Just what are
you doing...?
I made a prototype Energy Drink, and...

Oh...looks like your latest project is going well.
So why are you...
I let a boar drank it and...it went wild and fled...
A boar... No ordinary boar could've done this!

I even prepared shackles so it wouldn't escape.
I'm sure they were really strong!

Don't tell me it could do this with just one drink...
This is truly frightening...
This is a tremendous success...
It's an epic failure!
Such a pity...

Like hell it's a pity! This is likely going to cause
some severe damage to the neighborhood...

And if anything bad were to happen here, an
investigation would probably expose the lab!
Ngh... Beta, save me!

You need to fix it. Why are you mixing me up in
all of this...?

If Lady Alpha hears about this, it might spell...
Trouble?
Why are you involving me...? This is your fault.
No, it's the boar's fault.

No, it's because of that drink of yours! *sigh*
I should've drunk it when I had the chance...
There's still some left...!
Not a chance I'm drinking that now!!!

Ugh, looks like there's no other choice... I need
to go after that boar!
Okay, good luck...
You're gonna help me!!!
